```{r}
my.gradient <- colorRamp(c("#a28cab", "#7bc0bc"))
pal <- colorQuantile(
  my.gradient,
  domain = NULL,
  # map1$n.sfl,
  n = 10
  # na.color = "#808080",
  # alpha = FALSE,
  # reverse = FALSE,
  # right = FALSE
)

leaflet() %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$OpenStreetMap.DE) %>%
  addPolygons(data=map1, fillColor=~pal(n.sfl),
              color = "white",
              weight=2,
              fillOpacity = 0.8
              # highlightOptions = highlightOptions(color='white',weight=1,bringToFront = TRUE)
              )

```
